description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ffd0","text":"Protocol to prepare free floating mouse brain sections for immunostaining or in situ hybridization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":76,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvrci","text":"Deeply anesthetize mice via intraperitoneal injection of 2X Avertin solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cpreo","text":"Perform transcardial perfusion using chilled saline solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b97f8","text":"Switch from saline solution to chilled PFA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"u9r5","text":"Remove brain immediately after PFA perfusion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5fk70","text":"Incubate brain in PFA for 24 hours at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9559b","text":"Transfer brains to 30% Sucrose / 0.1M Phosphate Buffer (PB) – keep at 4°C for ≥ 24 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sb61","text":"Tissue should be completely saturated with sucrose before sectioning\n   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b0e8l","text":"Use a Leica SM2010R Microtome","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"asn6f","text":"Chill the microtome platform by covering it with crushed dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"47t2a","text":"Gently cover the brain in crushed dry ice to freeze the tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9hl9p","text":"Seal plate with parafilm and store tissue stored at -20°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d31g0","text":"Blade: Leica 16cm, knife angle set at 0 degree ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b9jd1","text":"0.9% NaCl kept on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3pu0v","text":"Use approximately 60mL saline solution per mouse","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7m1d","text":"4% paraformaldehyde in 0.1M phosphate buffer (PB) pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aplln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2g73s","text":" Use approximately 60mL PFA per mouse","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ho7v","text":"Brains will sink to the bottom of the vial when saturated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1obkp","text":"Cut thickness: 35µm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3f4fh","text":"Apply 5-10 drops of 30% Sucrose / 0.1M Phosphate Buffer (PB) solution to the chilled microtome platform and wait for it to solidify","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ccusl","text":"Use the microtome to gently shave the solidified sucrose to make a flat surface","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c08d4","text":"Adjust the microtome platform so that it is level with the blade and lock it into place","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b448m","text":"Use a razor blade to remove any spinal cord from the brain making a flat surface perpendicular to the rostral / caudal axis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gr20","text":"Apply 2-3 drops of sucrose to the existing sucrose platform and quickly position the brain with the olfactory bulbs pointing upwards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emgfs","text":"Apply 2-3 more drops of sucrose to the top of the brain to securely freeze it to the microtome platform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ugv0","text":"Adjust the microtome platform so that the rostral / caudal axis is perpendicular to the blade and the dorsal / ventral axis is level with the blade","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26sgc","text":"Collect sections in a 24-well plate prefilled with cryoprotectant solution (0.1M PB +30% Sucrose + 30% Ethylene Glycol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5ep6","text":"0.2M Phosphate Buffer (PB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eoq9g","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89pcq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqfq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[109,114],"data":[["1L","H2O"],["22.72 g\u0026nbsp;","Na2HPO4"],["5.52 g","NaH2PO4"]],"guid":"37F63C5E92224604888618116809968E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["1L","H2O"],["22.72 g\u0026nbsp;","Na2HPO4"],["5.52 g","NaH2PO4"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16c4s","text":"4% PFA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8snj0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfund","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91ua5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[109,"162"],"data":[["500mL","8% paraformaldehyde"],["500mL","0.2M PB"]],"guid":"12DA0DBD0BF44472A6EDD84C5565A86D","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["500mL","8% paraformaldehyde"],["500mL","0.2M PB"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9c2p","text":"Saline","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e1b1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82ftl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5lu1l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["121","134"],"data":[["1L","H2O"],["9 g","NaCl"]],"guid":"CAB693C6D7894632A495FCC9DF9DF61A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["1L","H2O"],["9 g","NaCl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9mpc","text":"30% Sucrose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2miq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lcj4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"98mq2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[109,114],"data":[["300g","Sucrose"],["Fill to 1L","0.1M PB"]],"guid":"DB163EDB1728470AAEB00D5C024ED3D5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1kfe4","text":"Stir and heat to 60°C until dissolved","type":"ordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":[],"printData":[["300g","Sucrose"],["Fill to 1L","0.1M PB"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qfe9","text":"Cryoprotectant Solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"u3nf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nfp5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jfrg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[109,114],"data":[["300g","Sucrose"],["300mL","Ethylene glycol\u0026nbsp;"],["Fill to 1L","0.1M PB"]],"guid":"91B01FAAEA334A32A715340CBE9D90BB","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":124,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"fadt3","text":"Completely dissolve sucrose in 0.1M PB before adding ethylene glycol. After adding ethylene glycol, fill to 1L with 0.1M PB.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["300g","Sucrose"],["300mL","Ethylene glycol\u0026nbsp;"],["Fill to 1L","0.1M PB"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
